content: sunny day slouch a n g e l a w i l s o n o f l e s b y r b e a s y c r o c h e t p a t t e r n this pattern is for personal use only in accordance to the copyright laws you may not alter sell or distribute this pattern in any way instructions hook / yarn round 1 k hook ch8 join to the first chain to form a ring ch2 20dc inside the ring join to the first double_crochet | 20 double_crochet s | hook round 2 ch4 counts as a double_crochet ch1 *double_crochet ch1* in the next st and in 6 5mm k hook / 5 omm h hook every stitch around join to the 3rd chain of the ch4 | 20dc s 20ch1 s | yarn medium 4 weight yarn cluster stitch *yo insert hook into the space yo pull up a loop yardage / gauge yo and pull through 2 loops* 3x s - 4 loops remaining yo pull through all 4 loops approx 200 yds / 182 m 10 stitches and 6 row = 4 in round 3 slip_stitch in the ch1sp ch2 *cluster in the ch1sp ch2* around to the end join to the top of the first cluster terms and stitches | 20 cluster 20 ch2 s | round 4 *single_crochet in the top of the cluster 2sc in the ch2sp* around to slip_stitch / slip_stitch the end join to the first single_crochet | 60 single_crochet s | ch4 / double_crochet ch1 round 5 ch2 *dcblo3 incblo* around to the end join to the first double_crochet / double_crochet st dc2-dc3 / work one double_crochet in that amount |75 double_crochet s | of stitches round 6 ch4 double_crochet in the same st *ch1 skip 2 v_stitch in the next st * increase / increase 2 double_crochet s in the same stitch around to the end ch1 join to the 3rd chain v_stitch / double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in the same stitch | 25 v s 25 ch1sp | single_crochet / single_crochet round 7 slip_stitch to the center ch1sp of the v_stitch ch4 double_crochet in the chain / chain same space *ch1 v_stitch in the center of the next v st * around chsp / chain space to the end ch1 join to the 3rd chain st / stitch | 25 v s 25 ch1sp | space / space rnds 8-16 repeat round 7 11 rnds of v s cluster / cluster stitch round 17 slip_stitch to the ch1sp of the v_stitch ch4 double_crochet in the same st *v blo / back loop only stitch in the center of the next v st * around to the end join to * instructions to repeat the 3rd chain |25 v s| fo / fasten_off round 18 ch1 single_crochet in the same st single_crochet in each chsp and st around to the end join to the first st with a slip_stitch |75sc| links
